description:
Kugimiya Masami is a dancer whose style can be described as elegant, strict and traditional. He hides an insecure, sensitive, and overthinking personality behind his calm and contained persona. He trains under http://anidb.net/ch90869 [Hyoudou Marisa] ever since he had his spine injury. Masami`s dancing partner is http://anidb.net/ch92129 [Idogawa Tamie].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kugimiya Masami
